main event: On 13 May 1949, multiple witnesses near Boise, Idaho reported seeing six unidentified flying objects flying in a 'V' formation.
interesting points: The objects were described as being larger than a B-29 aircraft,They appeared silver on top and black on the bottom,There was no sound emitted from the objects,Witnesses saw the objects make a slow spiral descent before shooting upward at high speeds,Reports indicate the objects changed formation during their flight.
witness description: A farmer and a newspaper reporter were among the witnesses who observed the flying objects.
